DOC.brief_summary: Infusion of Mesenchymal Stem Cell (MSC) at day of recovery after bone marrow transplant (BMT) for patients with AL, AA and MM for acute Graft-versus-host Disease (GVHD) prophylaxis and treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Mesenchymal Stem Cells Infusion for aGVHD Prophylaxis Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Infusion of mesenchymal stem cells at day of recovery after BMT for patients with AL, AA and MM for acute GVHD prophylaxis and treatment. Infusion at dose 1 cells mln/kg at day of white blood cells recovery.
DOC.criteria: allogenic BMT from related or unrelated donor Severe infection Relapse admission to ICU refusal of research patients with graft failure
